description:
1. Extract: Extract Emails, #tags, @mentions, Urls from any text source. Also get a html tagged formatted text for direct use.
2. Mentions: Use inline mentions while typing just like you see on facebook, twitter, slack etc.
instructions:
1. Extract:
(i) Install the 'extract' element on the page
(ii) The source data goes into the input on extractor
(iii) The extracted values are accessed as This Extractor's emails, urls, hashtags, mentions etc.

2. Mentions:
(i) Specify the color of mentions in plugins tab
(ii) Use the 'Setup Mentions' workflow action after page (entire) is loaded / whenever you want. That's it !
name: Tagger
plugin_instructions:
1. Extract:
(i) Install the 'extract' element on the page
(ii) The source data goes into the input on extractor
(iii) The extracted values are accessed as This Extractor's emails, urls, hashtags, mentions etc.

2. Mentions:
(i) Specify the color of mentions in plugins tab
(ii) Use the 'Setup Mentions' workflow action after page (entire) is loaded / whenever you want. That's it !

For more detailed instructions, please refer the following links:
1. https://buildingonbubble.com/block/tagger-plugin-for-mentions-1515412723033x963917052088942600
2. https://forum.bubble.is/t/new-plugin-tagger/18909
